normal_treasure.name: Normal Treasure
normal_treasure.description: (d20 * level) + 100 gold pieces in normal treasure.

advanced_treasure.name: Advanced Treasure
advanced_treasure.description: Roll another d20 and add the player's level to the result to determine advanced treasure details.

base_item_only.name: Base Item Only
base_item_only.description: Only a base item is awarded.

prefix_base_item.name: Prefix + Base Item
prefix_base_item.description: A base item with a prefix is awarded.

base_item_suffix.name: Base Item + Suffix
base_item_suffix.description: A base item with a suffix is awarded.

prefix_base_item_suffix.name: Prefix + Base Item + Suffix
prefix_base_item_suffix.description: A base item, with a prefix, and a suffix is awarded.

ancient_armor.name: Ancient Armor
ancient_armor.effect: AC 2, absorbs 1 hp of damage per attack

cap.name: Cap
cap.effect: AC 9 against called shots to the head, one per character

skull_cap.name: Skull Cap
skull_cap.effect: AC 8 against called shots to the head, one per character

helm.name: Helm
helm.effect: AC 7 against called shots to the head, one per character

mask.name: Mask
mask.effect: AC 6 against called shots to the head, one per character

full_helm.name: Full Helm
full_helm.effect: AC 5 against called shots to the head, one per character

great_helm.name: Great Helm
great_helm.effect: AC 4 against called shots to the head, one per character

bone_helm.name: Bone Helm
bone_helm.effect: AC 3 against called shots to the head, one per character

crown.name: Crown
crown.effect: AC 2 against called shots to the head, one per character

gloves.name: Gloves
gloves.effect: AC 8 against called shots to the hands, one pair per character

sash.name: Sash
sash.effect: AC 8 against called shots to the waist, one per character

leather_boots.name: Leather Boots
leather_boots.effect: AC 8 against called shots to the feet, one pair per character

bracers.name: Bracers
bracers.effect: AC 5 against called shots to the hands, one pair per character

belt.name: Belt
belt.effect: AC 5 against called shots to the waist, one per character

chain_boots.name: Chain Boots
chain_boots.effect: AC 5 against called shots to the feet, one pair per character

gauntlets.name: Gauntlets
gauntlets.effect: AC 3 against called shots to the hands, one pair per character

girdle.name: Girdle
girdle.effect: AC 3 against called shots to the waist, one per character

plate_boots.name: Plate Boots
plate_boots.effect: AC 3 against called shots to the feet, one pair per character

buckler.name: Buckler
buckler.effect: AC +1 against one attack per round

small_shield.name: Small Shield
small_shield.effect: AC +1 against two attacks per round

spiked_shield.name: Spiked Shield
spiked_shield.effect: AC +1 against all attacks, off-hand attack for 1d4/1d4

bone_shield.name: Bone Shield
bone_shield.effect: AC +2 against all melee attacks (no bonus against missiles)

tower_shield.name: Tower Shield
tower_shield.effect: AC +1 against all attacks, +2 vs. missiles

gothic_shield.name: Gothic Shield
gothic_shield.effect: AC +2 against all attacks, minimum Strength 18

pike.name: Pike
pike.effect: damage 1d6/1d12, double damage when set for charge

brandistock.name: Brandistock
brandistock.effect: damage 1d10/2d6, minimum Strength 18, cannot be disarmed

repeating_crossbow.name: Repeating Crossbow
repeating_crossbow.effect: fired 40/60/80 (up to 5/1 ROF), 1d3/1d3, needs 1 round reloading after 5 shots

torch.name: Torch
torch.effect: damage 1d3/1d2 fire damage when lit, can be reused, light radius 30'

bone_wand.name: Bone Wand
bone_wand.effect: damage 1d3/1d2 one-handed, use restricted to necromancers

yew_wand.name: Yew Wand
yew_wand.effect: damage 1d2/1d3 one-handed, use restricted to sorcerers and druids

charm.name: Charm
charm.effect: has its effect if carried on person

ring.name: Ring
ring.effect: worn on hand, one per hand

flag.name: Flag
flag.effect: draped over body, one per character

orb.name: Orb
orb.effect: one per character, worn on arm, cannot use shield while using orb

amulet.name: Amulet
amulet.effect: worn on neck, one per character

scroll.name: Scroll
scroll.effect: can be read once to cast spell, at minimum level necessary to cast spell

rune.name: Rune
rune.effect: can be set once as a trap, acts as a 'glyph of warding' with the listed spell's effect

book.name: Book
book.effect: can be read once to gain the spell, allows one improvement class for its spell

potion_of_mana.name: Potion of Mana
potion_of_mana.effect: restores 1 previously cast spell of 1st-3rd level

potion_of_rejuvenation.name: Potion of Rejuvenation
potion_of_rejuvenation.effect: heals 2d4+2 damage and restores 1 previously cast spell of 1st-3rd level

detox_potion.name: Detox Potion
detox_potion.effect: casts 'slow poison' on user for 2d4 turns

potion_of_chi.name: Potion of Chi
potion_of_chi.effect: gives new save against any mind-affecting spell or effect

potion_of_full_chi.name: Potion of Full Chi
potion_of_full_chi.effect: dispels any mind-affecting spell or effect

potion_of_restoration.name: Potion of Restoration
potion_of_restoration.effect: heals all damage, dispels any mind-affecting spell or effect

flaming_oil.name: Flaming Oil
flaming_oil.effect: flaming oil in 5' radius for 2d4+2 fire damage for 1d4 rounds

explosive_potion.name: Explosive Potion
explosive_potion.effect: explosion in 10' radius for 3d4+3 fire damage (save vs. dragon breath for half)

fulminating_potion.name: Fulminating Potion
fulminating_potion.effect: explosion in 20' radius for 6d4+6 fire damage (save vs. dragon breath for half)

rancid_gas_potion.name: Rancid Gas Potion
rancid_gas_potion.effect: poison gas in a 10' cloud for 1d6+1 poison damage (save vs. poison for half)

choking_gas_potion.name: Choking Gas Potion
choking_gas_potion.effect: poison gas in a 10' cloud for 2d6+2 poison damage (save vs. poison for half)

strangling_gas_potion.name: Strangling Gas Potion
strangling_gas_potion.effect: poison gas in a 10' cloud for 3d6+3 poison damage (save vs. poison for half)

acidic_potion.name: Acidic Potion
acidic_potion.effect: item must save against acid at -2 or be destroyed

indigo_herb.name: Indigo Herb
indigo_herb.effect: +3 save vs cold and -25% damage from cold for 1 turn

cerulean_herb.name: Cerulean Herb
cerulean_herb.effect: +4 save vs cold and -50% damage from cold for 1 turn

russet_herb.name: Russet Herb
russet_herb.effect: +3 save vs fire and -25% damage from fire for 1 turn

vermilion_herb.name: Vermilion Herb
vermilion_herb.effect: +4 save vs fire and -50% damage from fire for 1 turn

crackling_herb.name: Crackling Herb
crackling_herb.effect: +3 save vs lightning and -25% damage from lightning for 1 turn

forked_herb.name: Forked Herb
forked_herb.effect: +4 save vs lightning and -50% damage from lightning for 1 turn

swart_herb.name: Swart Herb
swart_herb.effect: +3 save vs spell and -25% damage from spell for 1 turn

atramentous_herb.name: Atramentous Herb
atramentous_herb.effect: +4 save vs spell and -50% damage from spell for 1 turn

vital_herb.name: Vital Herb
vital_herb.effect: +3 save vs poison and -25% damage from poison for 1 turn

enduring_herb.name: Enduring Herb
enduring_herb.effect: +4 save vs poison and -50% damage from poison for 1 turn

urgent_herb.name: Urgent Herb
urgent_herb.effect: -3 to initiative rolls for 1 turn when attacking with a melee weapon

fleet_herb.name: Fleet Herb
fleet_herb.effect: -6 to initiative rolls for 1 turn when attacking with a melee weapon

brisk_herb.name: Brisk Herb
brisk_herb.effect: -3 to initiative rolls for 1 turn when attacking with a missile weapon

swift_herb.name: Swift Herb
swift_herb.effect: -6 to initiative rolls for 1 turn when attacking with a missile weapon

dazzling_herb.name: Dazzling Herb
dazzling_herb.effect: user gets 1 extra spell of each level, all must be cast within 1 turn

fascinating_herb.name: Fascinating Herb
fascinating_herb.effect: user gets 2 extra spells of each level, all must be cast within 1 turn

mystical_herb.name: Mystical Herb
mystical_herb.effect: all of user's spells cast within 1 turn have +50% duration

arcane_herb.name: Arcane Herb
arcane_herb.effect: all of user's spells cast within 1 turn have double duration

elixir_of_psionics.name: Elixir of Psionics
elixir_of_psionics.effect: +2 save vs. mind-affecting spells and effects for 1 day

elixir_of_damage.name: Elixir of Damage
elixir_of_damage.effect: minimum base damage from user's attacks is 2 for 1 day

elixir_of_power.name: Elixir of Power
elixir_of_power.effect: +1 1st level spell (if user can cast such spells) for 1 day

oil_or_resin_of_accuracy.name: Oil or Resin of Accuracy
oil_or_resin_of_accuracy.effect: anointed weapon is +2 to hit for 1 turn (50% chance to be Resin)

oil_or_resin_of_precision.name: Oil or Resin of Precision
oil_or_resin_of_precision.effect: anointed weapon is +3 to hit for 1 turn (50% chance to be Resin)

oil_or_resin_of_mastery.name: Oil or Resin of Mastery
oil_or_resin_of_mastery.effect: anointed weapon is +4 to hit for 1 turn (50% chance to be Resin)

oil_or_resin_of_sharpness.name: Oil or Resin of Sharpness
oil_or_resin_of_sharpness.effect: anointed weapon is +2 damage for 1 turn (50% chance to be Resin)

oil_or_resin_of_pain.name: Oil or Resin of Pain
oil_or_resin_of_pain.effect: anointed weapon is +3 damage for 1 turn (50% chance to be Resin)

oil_or_resin_of_savagery.name: Oil or Resin of Savagery
oil_or_resin_of_savagery.effect: anointed weapon is +4 damage for 1 turn (50% chance to be Resin)

oil_or_resin_of_death.name: Oil or Resin of Death
oil_or_resin_of_death.effect: anointed weapon is +5 damage for 1 turn (50% chance to be Resin)

oil_of_hardening.name: Oil of Hardening
oil_of_hardening.effect: anointed weapon gives AC +2 for 1 turn

oil_of_imperviousness.name: Oil of Imperviousness
oil_of_imperviousness.effect: anointed weapon gives AC +3 for 1 turn

oil_of_immunity.name: Oil of Immunity
oil_of_immunity.effect: anointed weapon gives AC +4 for 1 turn

oil_of_skill.name: Oil of Skill
oil_of_skill.effect: grants proficiency in the anointed item to anyone holding the item for 1 turn

oil_of_fortitude.name: Oil of Fortitude
oil_of_fortitude.effect: repairs any damage to an item

blacksmith's_oil.name: Blacksmith's Oil
blacksmith's_oil.effect: gives +4 to item saving throws for 1 turn

oil_of_enchantment.name: Oil of Enchantment
oil_of_enchantment.effect: permanently changes weapon's type (roll new d20+40 on Base Item Table)

monstrous_body_part.name: Monstrous Body Part
monstrous_body_part.effect: roll d12 for type; for power roll again on this table, if second roll is 100 then roll twice more

cursed.name: Cursed
cursed.description: roll the base item's prefix roll

capricious.name: Capricious
capricious.description: roll again on the prefix table using d100 instead of item's normal roll

has_a_chance_for_extra_damage.name: Has a Chance for Extra Damage

improves_to_hit_scores_and_has_a_chance_.name: Improves To Hit Scores and Has a Chance for Extra Damage

cursed.name: Cursed
cursed.description: roll the base item's prefix roll

capricious.name: Capricious
capricious.description: roll again on the prefix table using d100 instead of item's normal roll

allows_the_casting_of_a_spell.name: Allows the Casting of a Spell

sturdy.name: Sturdy
sturdy.effect: +1 AC (weighs the same as regular armor)

pearl.effect: +1 save vs mind-affecting spells and effects

ivory.name: Ivory
ivory.effect: +2 save vs. mind-affecting spells and effects

pyrite.name: Pyrite
pyrite.effect: +3 save vs acid and -25% damage from acid

cobalt.effect: +3 save vs cold and -25% damage from cold

garnet.effect: +3 save vs. fire and -25% damage from fire

coral.name: Coral
coral.effect: +3 save vs. lightning and -25% damage from lightning

crystal.name: Crystal
crystal.effect: +3 save vs. mind-affecting spells and effects

viridian.name: Viridian
viridian.effect: +3 save vs. poison and -25% damage from poison

ebony.name: Ebony
ebony.effect: +3 save vs. spell and -25% damage from spell

crysolite.name: Crysolite
crysolite.effect: +4 save vs. acid and -50% damage from acid

sapphire.name: Sapphire
sapphire.effect: +4 save vs. cold and -50% damage from cold

ruby.name: Ruby
ruby.effect: +4 save vs. fire and -50% damage from fire

amber.name: Amber
amber.effect: +4 save vs. lightning and -50% damage from lightning

diamond.name: Diamond
diamond.effect: +4 save vs. mind-affecting spells and effects

emerald.name: Emerald
emerald.effect: +4 save vs. poison and -50% damage from poison

obsidian.name: Obsidian
obsidian.effect: +4 save vs. spell and -50% damage from spell

subduing.name: Subduing
subduing.effect: foe saves or gets a +5 initiative penalty for 1d4 rounds

wearying.name: Wearying
wearying.effect: foe saves or loses initiative for 1d4 rounds

phasing.name: Phasing
phasing.effect: foe saves or next attack is at 50% damage as he or she phases out for a moment

depleting.name: Depleting
depleting.effect: foe saves or loses initiative for 2d4 rounds

howling.name: Howling
howling.effect: foe saves or suffers fear for 1d4 rounds (if 4HD/levels or less)

chaotic.name: Chaotic
chaotic.effect: foe saves or changes to random alignment for 1d4+1 rounds

subjugating.name: Subjugating
subjugating.effect: foe saves or loses initiative each round for 4d4 rounds

fatiguing.name: Fatiguing
fatiguing.effect: foe saves or is slowed for 1d4 rounds

exhausting.name: Exhausting
exhausting.effect: foe saves or is slowed for 2d4 rounds

overwhelming.name: Overwhelming
overwhelming.effect: foe saves or is slowed for 3d4 rounds

fletcher's.name: Fletcher's
fletcher's.effect: +1 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Amazons only)

slayer's.name: Slayer's
slayer's.effect: +1 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Barbarians only)

summoner's.name: Summoner's
summoner's.effect: +1 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Necromancers only)

monk's.name: Monk's
monk's.effect: +1 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Paladins only)

angel's.name: Angel's
angel's.effect: +1 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Sorcerers only)

archer's.name: Archer's
archer's.effect: +2 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Archer's only)

berserker's.name: Berserker's
berserker's.effect: +2 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Barbarian's only)

necromancer's.name: Necromancer's
necromancer's.effect: +2 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Necromancer's only)

priest's.name: Priest's
priest's.effect: +2 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Paladin's only)

arch-angel's.name: Arch-Angel's
arch-angel's.effect: +2 level/score with nonweapon profs and spells (Sorcerer's only)

frog's.name: Frog's
frog's.effect: -1 1st level spell per day (if the userr can cast such spells)

pitch.name: Pitch
pitch.effect: any light source carried by user has a -10' radius

crystalline.name: Crystalline
crystalline.effect: when damage is dealt add 1d6; if a 6 is rolled, item does no damage and is destroyed

useless.name: Useless
useless.effect: attacking with this item causes no damage

dull.name: Dull
dull.effect: -1 to hit and base damage is halved (round down)

clumsy.name: Clumsy
clumsy.effect: -2 to hit and base damage is reduced to 1

capricious.name: Capricious
capricious.effect: roll again on prefix table using d100 instead of item's normal roll

unseen.name: Unseen
unseen.description: user is invisible to all beings more than 30' away

hidden.name: Hidden
hidden.description: user is invisible to all beings more than 20' away

veiled.name: Veiled
veiled.description: user is invisible to all beings more than 10' away

stalking.name: Stalking
stalking.description: user is invisible on any round he or she does not move, attack, or cast a spell

lizard's.name: Lizard's
lizard's.effect: +1 1st level spell per day (if the user can cast such spells)

spider's.name: Spider's
spider's.effect: +1 1st & 2nd level spells per day (if the user can cast such spells)

raven's.name: Raven's
raven's.effect: +1 1st-3rd level spells per day (if the user can cast such spells)

snake's.name: Snake's
snake's.effect: +1 1st-4th level spells per day (if the user can cast such spells)

serpent's.name: Serpent's
serpent's.effect: +1 1st-5th level spells per day (if the user can cast such spells)

drake's.name: Drake's
drake's.effect: +1 1st-6th level spells per day (if the user can cast such spells)

dragon's.name: Dragon's
dragon's.effect: +1 1st-7th level spells per day (if the user can cast such spells)

wyrm's.name: Wyrm's
wyrm's.effect: +1 1st-8th level spells per day (if the user can cast such spells)

hydra's.name: Hydra's
hydra's.effect: +1 1st-9th level spells per day (if the user can cast such spells)

devious.name: Devious
devious.effect: when user casts a spell, there is a 1 in 10 chance that it restores itself in memory

fortified.name: Fortified
fortified.effect: when user casts a spell, there is a 1 in 4 chance that it restores itself in memory

vulpine.name: Vulpine
vulpine.effect: user may reduce any damage by 25% if he or she loses one memorized spell

chrono.name: Chrono
chrono.effect: doubles the duration of oils and resins

catalyzing.name: Catalyzing
catalyzing.effect: doubles the effect of oils and resins

white.name: White
white.effect: +1 save vs mind-affecting spells and effects

muscular.name: Muscular
muscular.effect: minimum damage per die in melee attacks is 2 points

iron.name: Iron
iron.effect: +1 to hit, +2 vs. undead and demonic creatures

steel.name: Steel

platinum.name: Platinum
platinum.effect: +3 to hit, +4 vs. undead and demonic creatures

weird.name: Weird
weird.effect: +5 to hit, extra successful hit on a natural 20

jagged.name: Jagged
jagged.effect: double base damage on a natural 20

deadly.name: Deadly
deadly.effect: double base damage on a natural 19-20

vicious.name: Vicious
vicious.effect: double base damage on a natural 18-20

heavy.name: Heavy
heavy.effect: double base damage on a natural 17-20

ruthless.effect: double base damage on a natural 13-20

merciless.effect: double base damage on a natural 12-20

sharp.effect: +1 to hit, double base damage on a natural 20

fine.name: Fine
fine.effect: +1 to hit, double base damage on a natural 19-20

warrior's.effect: +1 to hit, double base damage on a natural 18-20

soldier's.name: Soldier's
soldier's.effect: +1 to hit, double base damage on a natural 17-20

knight's.name: Knight's
knight's.effect: +1 to hit, double base damage on a natural 16-20

master's.name: Master's
master's.effect: +1 to hit, double base damage on a natural 15-20

plentiful.name: Plentiful
plentiful.effect: has twice the normal maximum charges

jester's.name: Jester's
jester's.effect: casts a random spell from Suffixes 91-00 when activated

bountiful.name: Bountiful
bountiful.effect: has three times the normal maximum charges

of_health.name: of Health
of_health.effect: -1 hit point of damage suffered with each attack

of_protection.name: of Protection
of_protection.effect: -2 hit points of damage suffered with each attack

of_absorption.name: of Absorption
of_absorption.effect: -3 hit points of damage suffered with each attack

of_life.name: of Life
of_life.effect: -4 hit points of damage suffered with each attack

of_deflection.name: of Deflection
of_deflection.effect: -5 hit points of damage suffered with each attack

of_thorns.name: of Thorns
of_thorns.effect: successful melee attack against the wearer inflicts 1d4 damage on the attacker

of_spikes.name: of Spikes
of_spikes.effect: successful melee attack against the wearer inflicts 2d4 damage on the attacker

of_blocking.name: of Blocking
of_blocking.effect: extra attack/round when using this item to parry or as armor 2d4 damage on the attacker

of_sturdiness.name: of Sturdiness
of_sturdiness.effect: item gets +2 on item saving throws

of_structure.name: of Structure
of_structure.effect: item gets +4 on item saving throws

of_the_ages.name: of the Ages
of_the_ages.effect: item cannot be damaged or destroyed

of_bonding.name: of Bonding
of_bonding.effect: every item carried gets +2 on item saving throws

of_unity.name: of Unity
of_unity.effect: every item carried gets +4 on item saving throws

of_tears.name: of Tears
of_tears.effect: +1 hit point of damage suffered with each attack

of_pain.name: of Pain
of_pain.effect: +2 hit points of damage suffered with each attack

of_brittleness.name: of Brittleness
of_brittleness.effect: every hit by this item requires a save vs. crushing blow or it is destroyed

of_decay.name: of Decay
of_decay.effect: +2 damage, every hit requires a save vs. crushing blow or it is destroyed

of_fragility.name: of Fragility
of_fragility.effect: on the first use of this item in combat, it is destroyed

of_pox.name: of Pox
of_pox.effect: user cannot regain hit points while in possession of this item

of_corruption.name: of Corruption
of_corruption.effect: user cannot restore cast spells while in possession of this item

of_infection.name: of Infection
of_infection.effect: spells that affect only the user's mind last until dispelled

of_ruin.name: of Ruin
of_ruin.effect: 1 spell per day must be memorized as if it were 1 level higher

of_the_exposed.name: of the Exposed
of_the_exposed.effect: 2 spells per day must be memorized as if it were 1 level higher

of_the_night.name: of the Night
of_the_night.effect: any light source carried by user has a -10' radius

of_the_dark.name: of the Dark
of_the_dark.effect: any light source carried by user has a -20' radius

of_the_void.name: of the Void
of_the_void.effect: any light source carried by user has a -30' radius

of_passivity.name: of Passivity
of_passivity.effect: +2 initiative penalty when attacking with this item

of_the_snail.name: of the Snail
of_the_snail.effect: user may only attack once per two rounds when using this item

of_the_fool.name: of the Fool
of_the_fool.effect: one random memorized spell per day vanishes after memorization

capricious.name: Capricious
capricious.effect: roll again on prefix table using d100 instead of item's normal roll

of_regeneration.effect: when regaining hit points, user regains +25% of the amount (up to maximum)

of_warding.name: of Warding

of_guarding.name: of Guarding

of_negation.name: of Negation

of_osmosis.name: of Osmosis

of_balance.name: of Balance

of_stability.name: of Stability
of_stability.effect: foe gets +2 initiative penalty in melee combat

of_harmony.name: of Harmony
of_harmony.effect: foe gets +3 initiative penalty in melee combat

of_greed.name: of Greed

of_wealth.name: of Wealth

of_radiance.name: of Radiance
of_radiance.effect: any light source carried by user has a +20' radius

of_the_sun.name: of the Sun
of_the_sun.effect: any light source carried by user has a +30' radius

of_warmth.name: of Warmth
of_warmth.effect: gives immunity to non-damaging effects of cold

of_remedy.name: of Remedy
of_remedy.effect: additional save vs. poison, -1d6 damage from poison

of_amelioration.name: of Amelioration
of_amelioration.effect: additional save vs. poison at +2, -2d6 damage from poison

of_defiance.name: of Defiance
of_defiance.effect: additional save vs. poison at +4, -3d6 damage from poison

of_purging.name: of Purging
of_purging.effect: additional save vs. poison, slow poison for 1d6 rounds

of_quality.name: of Quality
of_quality.effect: +1 damage, +2 damage vs. larger than man-sized creatures

of_slaying.name: of Slaying
of_slaying.effect: +2 damage, +3 damage vs. larger than man-sized creatures

of_devastation.name: of Devastation
of_devastation.effect: if maximum base damage is rolled then triple damage

of_the_jester.name: of the Jester
of_the_jester.effect: when damage is rolled, multiply by 1d4; on a 4, no damage is dealt

of_measure.name: of Measure
of_measure.effect: minimum base damage with this item is 2

of_worth.name: of Worth
of_worth.effect: minimum base damage with this item is 3

of_excellence.name: of Excellence
of_excellence.effect: minimum base damage with this item is 4

of_performance.name: of Performance
of_performance.effect: minimum base damage with this item is 5

of_readiness.name: of Readiness
of_readiness.effect: -1 initiative when attacking with this item

of_alacrity.name: of Alacrity
of_alacrity.effect: -2 initiative when attacking with this item

of_swiftness.name: of Swiftness
of_swiftness.effect: -3 initiative when attacking with this item

of_quickness.name: of Quickness
of_quickness.effect: -4 initiative when attacking with this item

of_speed.name: of Speed
of_speed.effect: user always wins initiative when attacking with this item

of_vileness.name: of Vileness
of_vileness.effect: wounds caused by this item can only be healed magically, negating regeneration

of_the_crusaders.name: of the Crusaders
of_the_crusaders.effect: +1 cumulative damage per successful consecutive attack against same foe

of_destruction.name: of Destruction
of_destruction.effect: foe's armor class is added to the weapon's damage

of_peril.name: of Peril
of_peril.effect: on a hit, foe takes double damage and wielder takes normal damage

of_the_bear.name: of the Bear
of_the_bear.effect: knocks foe out of melee range (10' away) on a successful hit

of_the_grizzly.name: of the Grizzly
of_the_grizzly.effect: knocks foe out of melee range (20' away) on a successful hit

of_the_leech.name: of the Leech
of_the_leech.effect: hit heals the user 1d4 hit points

of_the_claw.name: of the Claw
of_the_claw.effect: hit against a spellcaster restores one of user's cast 1st-3rd level Priest spells

of_the_bat.name: of the Bat
of_the_bat.effect: hit against a spellcaster restores one of user's cast 1st-3rd level Wizard spells

of_blood.name: of Blood
of_blood.effect: hit heals the user 1d6 hit points

of_the_talon.name: of the Talon
of_the_talon.effect: hit against a spellcaster restores one of user's cast Priest spells

of_the_vampire.name: of the Vampire
of_the_vampire.effect: hit against a spellcaster restores one of user's cast Wizard spells

of_the_lamprey.name: of the Lamprey
of_the_lamprey.effect: hit heals the user 2d4 hit points

of_piercing.name: of Piercing
of_piercing.effect: on a natural 20, foe's armor saves vs. crushing blow or is destroyed

of_breaking.name: of Breaking
of_breaking.effect: on a natural 20, foe's weapon saves vs. crushing blow or is destroyed

of_puncturing.name: of Puncturing
of_puncturing.effect: on a natural 19 or 20, foe's armor saves vs. crushing blow or is destroyed

of_smashing.name: of Smashing
of_smashing.effect: on a natural 19 or 20, foe's weapon saves vs. crushing blow or is destroyed

of_bashing.name: of Bashing
of_bashing.effect: on a natural 18, 19 or 20, foe's armor saves vs crushing blow or is destroyed

of_ease.name: of Ease
of_ease.effect: grants proficiency in using the item

of_simplicity.name: of Simplicity
of_simplicity.effect: grants proficiency and specialization in using the item

of_many.name: of Many
of_many.effect: can fire one charge/arrow per round for free (others cost or must be provided)

of_plenty.name: of Plenty
of_plenty.effect: can fire two charges/arrows per round for free (others cost or must be provided

of_(8th_level_spell).name: of (8th level spell)
of_(8th_level_spell).effect: random 8th level spell (or 7th level priest spell)

of_(9th_level_spell).name: of (9th level spell)
of_(9th_level_spell).effect: random 9th level spell (or 7th level priest spell)
